# Hybrid Connection Submodule

This submodule creates a hybrid connection for an Azure Relay namespace.

## Usage

```hcl
module "hybrid_connection" {
  source = "./modules/hybrid-connection"

  name                          = "my-hybrid-connection"
  relay_namespace_id            = azapi_resource.relay_namespace.id
  requires_client_authorization = true
  user_metadata                 = "some metadata"
}
```

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->
## Requirements

The following requirements are needed by this module:

- <a name="requirement_terraform"></a> [terraform](#requirement\_terraform) (>= 1.9, < 2.0)

- <a name="requirement_azapi"></a> [azapi](#requirement\_azapi) (~> 2.4)

## Resources

The following resources are used by this module:

- [azapi_resource.hybrid_connection](https://registry.terraform.io/providers/Azure/azapi/latest/docs/resources/resource) (resource)

<!-- markdownlint-disable MD013 -->
## Required Inputs

The following input variables are required:

### <a name="input_name"></a> [name](#input\_name)

Description: The name of the hybrid connection.

Type: `string`

### <a name="input_relay_namespace_id"></a> [relay\_namespace\_id](#input\_relay\_namespace\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the parent Relay namespace.

Type: `string`

## Optional Inputs

The following input variables are optional (have default values):

### <a name="input_avm_azapi_header"></a> [avm\_azapi\_header](#input\_avm\_azapi\_header)

Description: The AVM AzAPI header value to use for telemetry.

Type: `string`

Default: `""`

### <a name="input_enable_telemetry"></a> [enable\_telemetry](#input\_enable\_telemetry)

Description: Controls whether telemetry is enabled for the submodule.

Type: `bool`

Default: `false`

### <a name="input_requires_client_authorization"></a> [requires\_client\_authorization](#input\_requires\_client\_authorization)

Description: Indicates whether client authorization is required.

Type: `bool`

Default: `true`

### <a name="input_user_metadata"></a> [user\_metadata](#input\_user\_metadata)

Description: The user metadata associated with the hybrid connection.

Type: `string`

Default: `null`

## Outputs

The following outputs are exported:

### <a name="output_name"></a> [name](#output\_name)

Description: The name of the hybrid connection.

### <a name="output_resource"></a> [resource](#output\_resource)

Description: The full resource object of the hybrid connection.

### <a name="output_resource_id"></a> [resource\_id](#output\_resource\_id)

Description: The resource ID of the hybrid connection.

## Modules

No modules.
